titles.title: Drug and Alcohol Offenders Treatment Act of 1993
To amend the Contract Services for Drug Dependent Federal Offenders Act of 1978 to provide additional authorizations of appropriations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

term.name: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

bill.summary: 3/11/1993--Introduced. Drug and Alcohol Offenders Treatment Act of 1993 - Amends the Contract Services for Drug Dependent Federal Offenders Treatment Act of 1978 to authorize appropriations for FY 1993 through 1995.
